PRIVACY POLICY

At Family Farmers, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users’ personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and store your information when you use our services. By using the Family Farmers Milk Diary app or website, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

INFORMATION WE COLLECT

We collect personal information when you create an account or use our services, such as your name, email address, and phone number. We may also collect user-generated content, including comments, reviews, and other submitted content. Additionally, we collect information about how you use our services, such as interactions with features, pages visited, and dates and times of visits.

USE OF INFORMATION

We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, and respond to inquiries and requests. We may use your contact information to send updates, newsletters, and other communications, with the option to opt-out. Aggregated and anonymized data may be used for analytics purposes to better understand user behavior, trends, and preferences. In compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and governmental requests, we may use or disclose your information.

DATA SHARING AND DISCLOSURE

We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in providing and improving our services. These providers are obligated to maintain the confidentiality and security of your information. In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction. We may also disclose your information if required by law, court order, or governmental regulation.

DATA SECURITY

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the revised policy on our website or through other means. Your continued use of our services after the changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

CONTACT INFORMATION:

If you have questions or concerns about our refund policy, please contact us at:

FAMILY FARMERS COMPANY

Address: Family Farmers, Plot Number -2, Old Behrampur Colony Sector 59, Gurugram, Haryana- 122001 Phone: +91 95 55 55 55 65 Email: info@familyfarmers.co.in
